Blog.post: hi guys!itz been quite a while since i've last updated eh?..lOlz.thatz cos i've been far to busy liaoz.from studying for tests to doing homework..my mind is bound to give way one day..lolz..recently loads of fights have took place in my class..i wonder why too..hmMz...i think i'm turning to a bad girl too...from going to the toilet without permission...uttering a string of vulgarities and to quaralling with others...hmMz...wonder whatz wrong wif me...anyway..online thingys of mine are getting out of hand while things in reality are takin a better turn which i guess is terrific..hEhE...just waitin for teacher's day to come fer me to visit my old primary school..hmMz...what should i buy for my teachers nehx?oh and btw...recently starting to play gunbound again...starting to use nak for boomer's starting to suck big time...jackass!lolz...the day before this i was supposed to go for a girl guides meetin but instead i pontanked and didn't go...lolz...then went to parkway..and on the way back saw jingying...now so damn chio seh she..got backup toox..wonder why jac wasn't wif her...anywayz...i guess thatz about it...tA! eLmO's wOrld..lOlz...tAke cAre

wEeEe!!!tAdAe aFtEr sCh cAme bAck liAoz..rEcEntLy gOt sO mUch hOmEwOrk aNd tEstS tA pRepAre fOr..mE bRaiN gOnNa bReAk dOwn liAo mAn.....bUt tHeN i STILL hAve mY bRAiNs...lOlz....tHat sEntEnCe wAs fOr [f][r][e][a][k] tA rEad wAnz..aNYwAy....dIs fRidAe gOnNa gO wAtcH mOviE liAoz...aRouNd tHe woRld iN eiGhty dAys....siAnz iS wiTh tHe wHoLe sCh....nOt wiTh lAst tiMe dE fWen nAdiA....sIGh....sO fUn tA wAtCh wIf hEr...*bUt i'M sOO nOt a lEsbiAn aLriGht.....bTw i wAtch mEaN giRls liAoz...aNd tHe rEginA iS liKe sO coOl...yEt a liL biTchy tA mE...pOoR kAtEy kEnA *tEkAn* bY hEr aT fiRst....lOl...tHaNk gOd aT lAst tHe pLaStiCs wEnt sEpErAte wAys aNd rEgiNa's hEaD gOt rAn oVeR bY a bUs...wHahAhA.....lOlz....bUt tHeN a nEw bAtcH oF jUniOR pLaStiCs cAme....siGh....siAnz mAn..mY rOaLd dAhL boOk wiTh miSs tEo...fOrgOt tA tAke bAck...siGh...hOpEfuLLy tAmoRrOw i rEmeMbEr tA gEt iT bAck fRom hEr aNd hOpefUllY alSo...i'LL nOt bE lAte fEr sChoOl tAmArrOw...duNno whAt tA wRitE liAoz laR...sO bUh bYe.... *wiNkz stAr* *iN sEaRcH oF mY stAr iN tHe mIdniGht sKy.....**

tAdaE aFtEr sChoOl...stAyEd bAck wiTh sHiRley jEnNie aNd aNgEliN loR....fOrgOt tO gO tA giRl gUidEs meEtiN lEhz....lUckY mY fWeNs tOld mE tHe iNfo....tHeN iN sChoOl bERi siAn wAn lOr....jUst sEat aRouNd oNly...wHa liAo....tHeN pLay oNe gAmE oNly tHen tHeY dOn't wAnNa pLay liAo....siGhz....aBtEr aCtuAlly tHey wAn pLay bAskEtbAll wAn....buT tHen i didN't wAn...tHen juST slAck aRouNd lOr....tHeN wE aLL gO hoMe liAoz....sO siAnz....tHeN sAw mA cHildhoOd plAymAte loR...jErEmy....tHen toOk sAmE bUs....siGh.....i stArtiN' tA tHiNk tHAt mY liFe iS liKe sO uNfAir mAn....siAnz....dOn't cAre liAo loR....nOwaDays i fiNd iT diFfiCult fEr mE aNd aNgeLiN tO coMmuNicAte liKe tHat loR...cOs liKe sHe cHaNgEd aLotz liAo....soMe moRe difFeReNt clAsS liAoz....siAnz....wiSh i didN't cAmE tO tHis rOttEn sChoOl iN tHe fiRst pLacE mAn.....wiSh i wAs stiLL yOung aNd iN kiNdeRgArdEn dEn dOn't hAve sO muCh wOrRies liAo....siAnz....pINg yI sEc sUx tA tHe cOrE mAn....gOsh....aNywAy...toOdLez.... *wiNkz stAr* 5.20 pM sEaRchIn' fEr mA stAr iN tHe miDniGht sKy....
